name: WrongASD
description:
Can you navigate the levels when the keys are ever changing?

Play as a cube in a tron like arcade platformer where your controls shuffle after every keypress! 

  •  Try your reflexes in 24 levels!
  •   Dodge bullets!
  •   Navigate through each course...
  • ...and try not to press the wrong keys :)

It might look slow and easy but I assure you that it's stressful >:-)

Or maybe I just suck but that's not likely :))))

Made by me and my sister for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

CREDITS:

SeanSecret: Programming, Music and Sound

Angelique: Textures, Game and Level Design
